instructions: Image titled Add a Smart Action for Android Step 1 1 Open Smart Actions from your apps page. Then, click the plus symbol in the top right corner of the app. This button is for adding new actions. Image titled Add a Smart Action for Android Step 2 2 Select "suggestions" when the "add" menu appears. Image titled Add a Smart Action for Android Step 3 3 Select a suggested rule from the list that appears in the Suggestions menu. For example, you may choose "Sleep Rule" . Image titled Add a Smart Action for Android Step 4 4 Click "Yes" in the description of the Smart action to activate it on your phone. For example, the Sleep rule turns your ringer and text notifications to silent. Advertisement
